body: "Our new Government is seeking to amend our Constitution. It is not doing so to provide you with stronger guarantees of your rights as people of different sexual orientations": gspottt explains.
original_body: "Our new Government is seeking to amend our Constitution. It is not doing so to provide you with stronger guarantees of your rights as people of different sexual orientations": gspottt explains.
title: Trinidad & Tobago: Proposed Constitutional Amendments

sentence: "Our new Government is seeking to amend our Constitution.
It is not doing so to provide you with stronger guarantees of your rights as people of different sexual orientations": gspottt explains.
